meanings.definition: Following the end of a presidential term.
meanings.sent1: The postpresidential speech focused on future plans.
meanings.sent2: She attended a postpresidential event with former presidents.
meanings.sent3: The postpresidential party had presidential-themed decorations.
meanings.sent4: His postpresidential life was filled with new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The postpresidential period marked a transition in leadership.

meanings.definition: Relating to the time after someone has served as president.
meanings.sent1: The postpresidential memoir captured his experiences after office.
meanings.sent2: They discussed postpresidential activities of former leaders.
meanings.sent3: The postpresidential interview revealed behind-the-scenes stories.
meanings.sent4: Her postpresidential career focused on advocacy work.
meanings.sent5: The postpresidential era brought changes to political dynamics.
